programme.title: 48 HRS
programme.desc: A hard-nosed cop reluctantly teams up with a criminal temporarily paroled to him to track down a killer.

programme.title: Another 48 HRS
programme.desc: Jack Cates once again enlists the aid of ex-con Reggie Hammond - this time to take down The Iceman.

programme.title: Norbit
programme.desc: A mild-mannered guy meets the woman of his dreams and schemes to find a way to be with her.

programme.title: I Love You, Man
programme.desc: A friendless groom-to-be meets the ultimate dude and the two begin a “bro-mance."

programme.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
programme.desc: An anchorman's stint as top-rated newsreader is challenged when an ambitious newswoman becomes his co-anchor.

programme.title: Anchorman 2: The Legend Continues
programme.desc: Ron Burgundy returns to take New York City's first twenty-four-hour news channel by storm

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc: Steve & Doug will never make the Roxbury club’s list, until they have a fender bender with Richard Grieco.

programme.title: Zoolander
programme.desc: At the end of his career, a clueless fashion model is brainwashed to kill the Prime Minister of Malaysia.

programme.title: Old School
programme.desc: Frank, Mitch & Beanie have their frat raging with out-of-control antics. The dean sets out to shut them down.

programme.title: Blades of Glory
programme.desc: Two figure skating rivals are banned from the sport after a brawl over the gold medal.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: A group of actors shooting a big-budget war movie are forced to become the soldiers they are portraying.

programme.title: Daddy's Home 2
programme.desc: Dusty (Wahlberg) and Brad (Ferrell) finally have this co-parenting thing down, until their dads come to town.

programme.title: I Love You, Man
programme.desc: A friendless groom-to-be meets the ultimate dude and the two begin a “bro-mance."

programme.desc: An anchorman's stint as top-rated newsreader is challenged when an ambitious newswoman becomes his co-anchor.
